00046     class _OgreExport HighLevelGpuProgramFactory : public FactoryAlloc
00047     {
00048     public:
00049         HighLevelGpuProgramFactory() {}
00050         virtual ~HighLevelGpuProgramFactory();

00054             const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00055             const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader) = 0;
00056         virtual void destroy(HighLevelGpuProgram* prog) = 0;
00057     };
00071     class _OgreExport HighLevelGpuProgramManager 
00072         : public ResourceManager, public Singleton<HighLevelGpuProgramManager>
00073     {
00074     public:
00075         typedef map<String, HighLevelGpuProgramFactory*>::type FactoryMap;
00076     protected:
00078         FactoryMap mFactories;
00079 
00081         HighLevelGpuProgramFactory* mNullFactory;

00089             const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader,
00090             const NameValuePairList* params);

00097         void removeFactory(HighLevelGpuProgramFactory* factory);
00098

00101 
00102
